title: Test
yAxis: Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, with a total of 19 data points.
Overall Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP has increased over the Year.

Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP is slightly decreasing from 2000/01 to 2002/03, roughly increasing from 2002/03 to 2003/04, roughly constant from 2003/04 to 2009/10, roughly increasing from 2009/10 to 2010/11, roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2012/13, gradually increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2014/15, gradually increasing from 2014/15 to 2015/16, roughly constant from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
Max Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP about 2.99 was recorded at Year 2018/19
Min Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP about 1.29 was recorded at Year 2002/03
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009/10 to 2018/19.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2002/03 to 2005/06.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2007/08 to 2009/10.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2005/06 to 2007/08.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2000/01 to 2002/03.
